Title: Episode 8
Plot: After receiving a dressmaking commission from Lady Whiteleaf which could save her ailing business, Pearl finds herself panicking. When Enid shows up looking for work it seems Pearl has the answer to her problems. Pearl and Enid soon become close friends. Dorcas is worried though that Pearl is too trusting of Enid.
